name: Jailbreak 2022
description:
A 2D Pixel-Art side scroller video game where your goal is to break your

friend out of Jail! With the tools and gadgets at your disposal, you need to
infiltrate the Jail stealthily, find your target, and extract them safely.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space- Jump

Left mouse - Grappling hook

WS   - also for ladder

Credits:
